notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: Proteomic data relating to the pAHA-SILAC and pSILAC experiments was uploaded to ProteomeXchange Consortium via the PRIDE partner repository with the dataset identifier PXD011321 (pAHA-SILAC) and PXD015475, PXD015474 (pSILAC) RNA-sequencing data is publicly available under PRJNA495615 [ https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/PRJNA495615]. The source data underlying Figs. 1c, d, 2a–d, f–h, 3a, d, 4a, b, d, f, 5c–g, 6b–f and Supplementary Figs. 2 and 4a–c are available as Source Data file.
